name: Powerlifting Club
description: We meet weekly to lift weights and get stronger physically and mentally through a powerlifting focused workout. We are a growing community that will continue to get stronger and win meets.

officers.name: GiHo Jeong ghojeong@cps.edu Justin Chen jchen15@cps.edu Edmund Cai ehcai@cps.edu Joseph Twohig jtwohig@cps.edu  Max Renteria mrenteria6@cps.edu

announcements.title: Meetings
announcements.description: Club meetings take place Mon-Fri 6:45-7:45 after school in the Weight Room.
